resources.string: This type of notification allows the app to use a fake location, even in other apps.
Your location is faked, even in other apps.
Allow access to show your location on the map.
Your location will not be shown.
Prevent your workplace from tracking you by changing your virtual location to anywhere you like. Sit back and relax at a café while you’re appearing to work from the office.
Changing your location with Fackla requires turning on Developer Mode on your device. Tap “Become a Developer…” then find and tap Build Number seven times.
It’s usually under Software Information unless otherwise specified.
With Developer Mode turned on, you need to select Fackla as your mock location app. Tap “Select App…” to select Fackla as your mock location app.
Depending on your device, you may have to search or scroll for the option.
Your location is read to show your position on a map and fake your location for other apps. Fackla cannot function without permission to read your location.
Your location data is not sent to Fackla, it stays on your device.
You can change your location by tapping and holding a point on the map. When you’re done, tap “Stop Faking Location” to reset your location.
